statements: DELETE FROM order_processing_tasks WHERE customer_name = 'John Smith';
DELETE FROM order_processing_tasks WHERE order_id = 100 AND customer_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM order_processing_tasks WHERE order_timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND order_status = 'Pending';
DELETE FROM Orders WHERE order_date < '2022-01-01' AND customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM Customers WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe');
DELETE FROM OrderDetails WHERE product_id = 201 AND order_id = 105;
DELETE FROM Products WHERE product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM OrderDetails WHERE quantity < 5);
